summary: The crew of a popular ghost hunting show gets more than they bargained for when they come across a location that's actually haunted.
cast: Brad Norman|James Karen|Brittany Risner|David Gries|Joe Anderson|Dave Lyzenga|Jimmy Meritt|Sue Ellen Pabst|Evan Koons|Matt Sterenberg|Daniel Falicki|Amy McFadden|Molly Fowler|Victoria Mullen|Chris Eddy|Ryan Lieske|Jennah Pelton|Haley VanPortfliet|Charley Vanportfliet|Iain Pelton|Erin Lenau|Maggie Poltrock|Megan Horist|Jason Roth|Chris Randall
title: America's Most Haunted
